name: Cybermachine
description:
You're a cyborg.

You have been kidnapped. Now you find yourself on an unfamiliar spaceship. Something strange happened and you don't remember anything, but your cybernetic arm constantly lags and changes weapons every 10 seconds for some reason. What to do? We need to get out of here as soon as possible...

How to Play

What to do:  Find a way out of the spaceship. 

Controls

‘WASD’ or arrows ‘Up’, ‘Down’, ‘Left’, ‘Right’ - To Move

Left Shift - To Run

Left Mouse  - To Shoot or To Use

'R' - To Reload

Made for Ludum Dare 51 (Theme: "Every 10 seconds")
